channel.title: Compiling error
channel.description:
okay guys before you flame and stuff about go use the compiling errors and stuff as first topic i dont use it because i posted my problems there before and no one helps. So im using a topic
my error is when ever i try to compile it says
you do not not have java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. Finished! press any key to continue. . .
the code i have for it is
@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
and some people usually ask what i have so i have windows vista x64

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @supernovarsps supernovarsps
item.description:
@supernovarsps wrote:

okay guys before you flame and stuff about go use the compiling errors and stuff as first topic i dont use it because i posted my problems there before and no one helps. So im using a topic

my error is when ever i try to compile it says

you do not not have java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
Finished!
press any key to continue. . .

the code i have for it is

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

and some people usually ask what i have so i have windows vista x64

Read full topic
